response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $750,000, considering your interest and the potential long-term relationship we could build. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 750000}
